metadata.title: CVE-2018-14912 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
cgit_clone_objects in CGit before 1.2.1 has a directory traversal vulnerability when `enable-http-clone=1` is not turned off, as demonstrated by a cgit/cgit.cgi/git/objects/?path=../ request.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14912` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cgit - 1.1+git2.10.2-3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cgit package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1+git2.10.2-3.1').
